title: Using Git Submodules to share Test Artifacts in Katalon Studio
description: While working on a Katalon Studio project, you might want to use test artifacts from external resources. You can manually share test artifacts with the Test Artifacts Sharing feature provided by Katalon Studio. See: Test Artifacts Sharing.
